about_the_game:
Season 5 Pro Pass & Hall of Fame Pass will expire at 7:59AM PT, April 4th, 2025. Any purchase of the Season 5 Pro Pass or Hall of Fame Pass is non-refundable.

The NBA 2K25 Pro Pass: Season 5 takes your MyCAREER and MyTEAM experience to the next level. The Pro Pass unlocks access to 40 levels of earnable premium rewards, including up to 55,000 VC as you progress through the Season on your way to level 40! Get the Season 5 Pro Pass and automatically receive a Metallic Silver Baggy Pants, Metallic Silver Puffer Jacket, a Dark Matter Austin Reaves MyTEAM Card, and a Season 5 Pro Pass Pack.

*NBA 2K25 Pro Pass requires base game, internet connection and NBA 2K Account.
detailed_description:
Season 5 Pro Pass & Hall of Fame Pass will expire at 7:59AM PT, April 4th, 2025. Any purchase of the Season 5 Pro Pass or Hall of Fame Pass is non-refundable.

The NBA 2K25 Pro Pass: Season 5 takes your MyCAREER and MyTEAM experience to the next level. The Pro Pass unlocks access to 40 levels of earnable premium rewards, including up to 55,000 VC as you progress through the Season on your way to level 40! Get the Season 5 Pro Pass and automatically receive a Metallic Silver Baggy Pants, Metallic Silver Puffer Jacket, a Dark Matter Austin Reaves MyTEAM Card, and a Season 5 Pro Pass Pack.

*NBA 2K25 Pro Pass requires base game, internet connection and NBA 2K Account.

name: NBA 2K25 Pro Pass: Season 5

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Pro Pass: Season 5 unlocks access to 40 levels of premium rewards! Get the Pro Pass: Season 5 & automatically receive 4 additional Season Pass Rewards. *NBA 2K25 Pro Pass requires base game, internet connection and NBA 2K Account.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
